answers.answer: Hello,Pain in penis after jelqing and slow erection can be due to some nerve injury or compression due to jelqing. Other causes are stress and anxiety, poor communication with partner, unrealistic sexual expectations, negative feelings about non performance, smoking, alcohol and sometimes illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone or neurologic disorders.A detailed examination by a urologist along with a comprehensive profile of investigations is needed. You may need nerve conduction velocity test to rule out any nerve damage.Hope it helps. Take care.

question: Hi,I am suffering with severe pain in pennies and left testis. I have done jelqing exercise seven months back ever since then I have this pain. When ever I try to musterbate pennies gets erected slowly but I have to imagine someone for couple of minutes.During this time I tend to loose confidence on myself and then there will be no erectionI did not have this problem before doing jelqing exercise.I think it’s because of pain pennies is getting erected slowly. Sometimes I do haveErections during night time especially when I eat garlic during dinner. Is there any medicine for this pain to be cured . Due to want me to contact urologist for this.What are aphrsodiacs that I can have I know only about ginger and garlic.Regard'sSantosh.
title: pain in pennis
